review: I bought this to mirror my Kindle Fire to my TV set.  Turns out that with this you don't need the kindle Fire to watch Prime movies and TV series.  The picture is a little fuzzy some times, but that may be due to the fact that our internet is sometimes slow and we have to plug this into our receiver rather than directly into the TV. Bought this to replace a Belkin Miracast adapter.  The Fire Stick does more and is perfect for watching Amazon Prime Content.  My only beef is that when I was looking for something to mirror my Fire, nothing I read about the Fire Stick clearly indicated that it would do what I wanted to do.  So I wound up spending more money on the Belkin, which doesn't work very well.
